testcase.brief: Check if AP switch channel when encounter radar in static channel
testcase.description: Pre-Condition: Set wifi1 mode to access Set country code to 826 Test Procedure: 1. enable dfs 2. set wifi1 channel to dfs channel 3. simulate dfs with cli: int wifi1 _bang 4. Check if AP switch channel when encounter radar in static channel.

step.desc: change the region code. "boot-param region world" "boot-param country-code 826" "Note: To apply radio setting for the new country code, you must reboot the HiveAP. Do you want to reboot it now? <Y/N>y"

Initial configuration: "radio profile na" "radio profile na phymode 11na" "interface wifi1 radio profile na" "radio profile ng" "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" "radio profile na dfs" "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" "ssid test"
step.console: -v "interface wifi1 mode access" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}1" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}1" -v "interface wifi1 ssid ${ssid.name}1" -v "radio profile na" -v "radio profile na phymode 11na" -v "radio profile na dfs" -v "interface wifi1 radio profile na" -v "radio profile ng" -v "radio profile ng phymode 11ng" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile ng" -v "interface wifi0 radio channel 6" -v "interface wifi1 radio channel 52" -v "save config"

step.log-match: -c -i "wifi1" -i "ACSP DFS Radar found on chan" -i "switch to chan "
